result.name: local-authority-recorded-crime-key-offences-2007-2009
result.notes: Recorded crime statistics by local authority area in England and Wales for the year 2007/08 to 2008/09.  Includes violence against the person, sexual offences, robbery, burglary and vehicle crime.

odi-certificate.title: Local Authorities: Recorded crime for seven key offences and BCS comparator 2007/08 to 2008/09

organization.name: home-office
organization.title: Home Office
organization.description:
The Home Office leads on immigration and passports, drugs policy, crime policy and counter-terrorism and works to ensure visible, responsive and accountable policing in the UK.

Home Office is a ministerial department, supported by 26 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/home-office

result.title: Local Authorities: Recorded crime for seven key offences and BCS comparator 2007/08 to 2008/09
